author: bridge-bot
content:
<hwwang> Hello!
We are working on executable EIP-4844 CL specs (https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/2901). Some bugfixes of the minor errors will be backported to EIP-4844 itself once it’s merged.

Besides the bugs, some presentation suggestions that I want to check with EIP authors. Listed here: https://hackmd.io/UPfit4yWR5WRBEz7N8rSdQ

mainly around keyword “kzg”, which is a bit ambiguous in different cases.

author: bridge-bot
content:
